thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 17 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Meridia Real Estate III Signs Bridge Financing Of 15 Mln Euros

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Meridia Real Estate III Signs Bridge Financing Of 15 Mln Euros
text:
Jan 17 (Reuters) - MERIDIA REAL ESTATE III SOCIMI:
* SAID ON TUESDAY, SIGNS BRIDGE FINANCING THROUGH CREDIT POLICY WITH BANCO SANTANDER SA FOR A MAXIMUM AMOUNT OF 15 MILLION EUROS
* FINANCING HAS EXPECTED INITIAL DURATION OF 6 MONTHS WITH POSSIBILITY OF UP TO FIVE RENEWALS OF SIX MONTHS EACH
Source text: bit.ly/2DpkkGP
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
